title: It'll be Better This Time Around
description: An unhappy college dropout. A senator's son. One dark secret. And one true love.***16,500 WORD NEW ADULT CONTEMPORARY ROMANCE NOVELLA***Ivy Zheng has a secret—she’s still madly, deeply in love with her ex Logan Price. So when he shows up in Obscura, Ohio—the small town with a population of 508 where she works as a dissatisfied waitress—a large part of her wants to beg him to take her back. But the bigger, more reasonable part of her knows better. Another, darker secret from the past tore them apart, one that she intends to keep, even if it means keeping her from the love of her life.
author: Lily Ableman
